item.title: Python_crawler
item.description: 1. beautifulSoup 1.1 基础 #1.使用beautifulsoup解析html网页/读取a标签的链接 from bs4 import BeautifulSoup from urllib.request import urlopen html=urlopen("https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%AE%81%E5%9F%8E%E9%AB%98%E7%BA%A7%E4%B8%AD%E5%AD%A6/9016318?fr=aladdin").read().decode() print(html) #%% soup=BeautifulSoup(html,features="lxml") print(soup.h1) print(soup.div) #%% all_href=soup.find_all("a") for l in enumerate(all_href): if l[1].get('href'): print(l[0],l[1]['href']) #2.解析CS

item.title: Matplotlib
item.description: 不同的画图方式 scatter散点 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np n=1024 X=np.random.normal(0,1,n) Y=np.random.normal(0,1,n) #透明度 plt.scatter(X,Y,c=T,alpha=0.5) plt.xlim((-1.5,1.5)) plt.ylim((-1.5,1.5)) plt.xticks(()) plt.yticks(()) plt.show() bar柱状图 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np n = 12 X = np.arange(n) Y1 = (1 - X / float(n)) * np.random.uniform(0.5, 1.0, n) Y2 =

item.title: Python错误处理的细节
item.description: 错误处理的一些可记细节 try except finally continue和break不会影响异常处理机制 def test(): while True: try: a = 1/0 except Exception as e: print ("exception") continue finally: print ("finally") print ("out of try") if __name__ == '__main__': test() //输出 exception
